languages.text: Мятые бронезаслонки из пластали, готовые укрыть пост от бушующей черни, изрядно выщерблены следами от пуль.
The dented plasteel of the armoured barriers, designed to shield the station against the rabble's rage, is dotted with a good many bullet marks.
languages.original_text: Мятые бронезаслонки из пластали, готовые укрыть пост от бушующей черни, изрядно выщерблены следами от пуль.

traits.locale_text: The dented plasteel of the armoured flaps, designed to shield the station against the rabble's rage, is speckled with a good many bulletholes.

languages.text: El plastiacero abollado de las barreras blindadas, diseñadas para proteger a la estación contra la furia de la turba, está cubierto de marcas de bala.
languages.original_text: The dented plasteel of the armoured barriers, designed to shield the station against the rabble's rage, is dotted with a good many bullet marks.

traits.locale_text: El plastiacero abollado de las barreras blindadas, diseñadas para proteger a la estación contra la furia de la turba, está cubierto de marcas de bala.

languages.text: 駅を暴徒たちから守るために設計された装甲バリアのへこんだプラスチールには、たくさんの銃弾の跡が点在している。
languages.original_text: The dented plasteel of the armoured barriers, designed to shield the station against the rabble's rage, is dotted with a good many bullet marks.

traits.locale_text: 駅を暴徒たちから守るために設計された装甲バリアのへこんだプラスチールには、たくさんの銃弾の跡が点在している。

languages.text: 这些装甲护栏是用来阻挡暴乱分子的，上面的塑钢装甲布满了弹痕。
languages.original_text: The dented plasteel of the armoured barriers, designed to shield the station against the rabble's rage, is dotted with a good many bullet marks.

traits.locale_text: 这些装甲护栏是用来阻挡暴乱分子的，上面的塑钢装甲布满了弹痕。

languages.text: Der verbeulte Plaststahl der gepanzerten Barrieren zum Schutz der Station vor der Wut des Gesindels weist zahlreiche Spuren von Einschüssen auf.
languages.original_text: The dented plasteel of the armoured barriers, designed to shield the station against the rabble's rage, is dotted with a good many bullet marks.

traits.locale_text: Der verbeulte Plaststahl der gepanzerten Barrieren zum Schutz der Station vor der Wut des Gesindels weist zahlreiche Spuren von Einschüssen auf.

languages.text: Le plastacier bosselé des barrières blindées, conçues pour protéger la station de la fureur de la populace, est criblé d'impacts de tirs.
languages.original_text: The dented plasteel of the armoured barriers, designed to shield the station against the rabble's rage, is dotted with a good many bullet marks.

traits.locale_text: Le plastacier bosselé des barrières blindées, conçues pour protéger la station de la fureur de la populace, est criblé d'impacts de tirs.

languages.text: İstasyonu ayaktakımının öfkesine karşı korumak için tasalanan zırhlı bariyerlerin çentikli plasçeliği, nice merminin benek misali izleriyle kaplanmış.
